author: Staff Reporter
text:
Robbers, who tried to loot an Automated Teller Machine (ATM) at Pethanaickenpalayam in Yethapur abandon their operation as they were unable to break the machine here on Wednesday.

The incident came to light when villagers found the front door of the machine broken and informed the police. The police said that burglars tried to break one of the two machines in the room with an iron rod. Since the machine could not be opened, they left. The police said that both the ATMs had about Rs. 10 lakh. The ATM had no security person. However, the police recovered the footage from the surveillance camera and are investigating. Yethapur police registered a case.
title: Bid to loot ATM foiled
